markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 1" pfs="Standard">
[Glutton's Jaw](/Spells.aspx?ID=511)
<actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Morph" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=113" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
<trait label="Sorcerer" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=148" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 404 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Bloodline**
[Demonic](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=3)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

Your mouth transforms into a shadowy maw bristling with pointed teeth. These jaws are an unarmed attack with the forceful trait dealing 1d8 piercing damage. If you hit with your jaws and deal damage, you gain 1d6 temporary Hit Points.

---
**Heightened (+2)** The temporary Hit Points increase by 1d6.
name: Glutton's Jaw

summary_markdown: Your mouth transforms into a shadowy maw bristling with pointed teeth.
text: Glutton's Jaw Single Action Source Core Rulebook pg. 404 4.0 Bloodline Demonic Cast somatic, verbal Duration 1 minute --- Your mouth transforms into a shadowy maw bristling with pointed teeth. These jaws are an unarmed attack with the forceful trait dealing 1d8 piercing damage. If you hit with your jaws and deal damage, you gain 1d6 temporary Hit Points. --- Heightened (+2) The temporary Hit Points increase by 1d6.
